means: 地塞米松，氟美松（一种抗炎药）
德沙美松；地卡德隆；氟甲去氢氢化可的松；德萨美松

word_mean: 〔USP〕地塞米松，氟甲强的松龙：一种合成的糖皮质激素，作用强度为可的松的25倍。用于诊断Cushing综合征(见test项下dexamethasone suppression test)，肾上腺机能不全时的替代疗法以及用作抗炎剂。常用者为醋酸地塞米松和磷酸钠地塞米松

sentence.Network_en: Phenobarbital ( PB ) and dexamethasone ( DEX ) are P 450 inducers while troleandomycin ( TAO ) can inhibit P 4503 A activity.
sentence.Network_cn: 苯巴比妥 ( phenobarbital,PB ) 是P4502B、P4502C和 3A的强诱导剂;而地塞米松 ( dexamethasone, DEX ) 和三乙酰竹桃霉素 ( troleandomycin,TAO ) 则分别是P4503A的 强诱导剂和抑制剂.

sentence.Network_en: Objective : To study the counteraction of melatonin ( MT ) on the immunodepression induced by cyclophosphamide ( CY ) and dexamethasone ( DEX ).
sentence.Network_cn: 目的: 研究褪黑素 ( melatonin,MT ) 对环磷酰胺 ( cyclophosphamide,CY ) 、地塞米松 ( dexamethasone, DEX ) 所致免疫低下的对抗作用.

sentence.Network_en: AIM To investigate the efficacy and safety of phosphorylcholine dexamethasone - coated biodivYsio stents.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的评价以磷酸胆碱为载体的地塞米松涂层支架的安全性及近期有效性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1950s: from dexa- (blend of deca- and hexa-) + meth(yl) + -a- + (cortis)one

means.word_mean: 1. a corticosteroid drug (trade names Decadron or Dexamethasone Intensol or Dexone or Hexadrol or Oradexon) used to treat allergies or inflammation
